mapper.sql: a.vecd AS "vecd", a.adcd AS "adcd", a.channel AS "channel", a.address AS "address", a.isctown AS "isctown", a.cele AS "cele", a.clgtd AS "clgtd", a.clttd AS "clttd", a.eletype AS "eletype", a.method AS "method", a.signer AS "signer", a.audid AS "audid", a.status AS "status", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select: SELECT , b.adnm as "adnm" FROM IA_M_VSURFACE a left join ia_c_adinfo b on a.adcd = b.adcd WHERE a.vecd = #{vecd}

SELECT
,v.pid AS "pid", v.pname AS "pname",v.fpath AS "fpath",v.disc AS "disc" , info.adnm as "adnm" FROM IA_M_VSURFACE a left join rel_p_v b on a.vecd = b.vecd left join IA_P_INFO v on b.pid = v.pid left join ia_c_adinfo info on a.adcd = info.adcd
1=1
and a.adcd like #{adcd}+'%'
and a.vecd = #{vecd}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
order by a.moditime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IA_M_VSURFACE( vecd, adcd, channel, address, isctown, cele, clgtd, clttd, eletype, method, signer, audid, status, remark ) VALUES ( #{vecd}, #{adcd}, #{channel}, #{address}, #{isctown}, #{cele}, #{clgtd}, #{clttd}, #{eletype}, #{method}, #{signer}, #{audid}, #{status}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE IA_M_VSURFACE SET adcd = #{adcd}, channel = #{channel}, address = #{address}, isctown = #{isctown}, cele = #{cele}, clgtd = #{clgtd}, clttd = #{clttd}, eletype = #{eletype}, method = #{method}, signer = #{signer}, audid = #{audid}, status = #{status}, remark = #{remark} WHERE vecd = #{vecd}
